Class MoveTrashCmdlet

Moves a file to the Recycle Bin

This function will move a file, whether directory or file, to the system Recycle Bin. If the param list is true, it will print the contents of the current directory after recycling the file. Only error dialogs are printed and no confirmation message is shown.

trash

A sample Move-Trash command

Move-Trash -Path Documents\file.txt -List

Syntax

public class MoveTrashCmdlet : PSCmdlet
